nodes.text: The Malachor system was a star system located within the Chorlian sector in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy which contained the planets Malachor II, Malachor III, and Malachor V. For some reason, the system was considered taboo by the Mandalorians at the time. The system was also noted for one of its peculiar oddities, though it was known to only have three planets, the system was filled with mass shadows, more than what could be attributed to three planets, though Malachor V's gravity in particular was also immensely strong.
